description: Nerine is chained to the floor and wearing a hood awaiting her impending doom. She knows what she is here for, but she is unaware of the brutality that will soon ensue. Jack enters and gets to work, flogging her and then brings in a cane. She hates canes more than anything else and to use this on her shows that she has a long day ahead of her. After a sadistic beat down, she is bound standing and the fucking begins. She is then bent over and strapped down so there is no escaping the brutal fucking that comes next. The time has come and her ass is the target that Jack is going to fuck until she can take no more.
title: Impending Doom
